actions.name: Headbutt
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage  or 14 (4d4 + 4) slashing damage against a prone target.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon head breathes fire in a 15-foot cone. Creatures in the area make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw  taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

reactions.name: Tail Swipe (1/Day)
reactions.desc: If a creature within 5 feet hits the chimera with a melee attack, the attacker is battered by the chimeras tail. The attacker makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, it takes 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 10 feet from the chimera and knocked prone.

reactions.name: Winged Charge (1/Day)
reactions.desc: If a creature the chimera can see hits it with a ranged attack, the chimera leaps off the ground and moves up to its fly speed towards the attacker. If within range, the chimera then makes a headbutt attack against the attacker.

legendary_actions.name: The chimera can take 2 legendary actions
legendary_actions.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Bite
legendary_actions.desc: The chimera uses its Bite attack.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The chimera uses its Claw attack.

special_abilities.name: Reactive Heads
special_abilities.desc: The chimera can take three reactions per round, but not more than one per turn.

special_abilities.name: Three Heads
special_abilities.desc: The chimera has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious, and it can't be flanked.

special_abilities.name: Wakeful
special_abilities.desc: When one of the chimeras heads is asleep, the others are awake.
